text: Touring the hospital in Antofagasta. In the afternoon I leave for Calama and then Copiapó
The day began a while ago. Now in Copiapó, in the afternoon I arrive at La Serena
Thank you very much for all the love of the people of La Serena. Now I'm on my way to Ovalle
I just left my breakfast with the winners of the Chile with Todos contest. Now to prepare my tour south of tomorrow
In Puerto Montt, meeting with candidates
On a busy day. Now we are on our way to Osorno
Marvelous with the beautiful cities of the south. Now heading to Valdivia
They just received me with a delicious breakfast at Padre Las Casas. I'm on my way to Cunco
On the way to the office
In the office, seeing what I can have lunch. Any recommendation?
I'm going to visit my friend Luis Plaza, candidate for Cerro Navia who recovers from a stone
In the final stretch of the municipal campaign
Supporting the Concepción candidates ... there is little left for the municipal
Beginning to plan the campaign closings and activities next Sunday
How inspiring was the closing of the campaign .. Now we only have to wait on Sunday. The photos are at www.flickr.com/sebastianpinera
Congratulations to all who worked so hard for this great triumph. To continue working!!
Congress today Ramle evening and Givatayim
